original: In the fiery pits, amidst sin and brimstone, I stood as the anointed heir to Satan's throne. Tasked with safeguarding the souls and warding off contenders, I embarked on rigorous training. Every day, wielding the trident, I mastered ancient combat techniques. By nightfall, I unraveled forbidden knowledge to outwit those desperate for redemption.
